statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude FROM satellite_tracking_data;
SELECT timestamp, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY satellite_id ASC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT satellite_id FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10;
SELECT MAX(latitude) AS max_lat, MIN(longitude) AS min_long FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data
SELECT location, tracking_time FROM satellite_tracking_data ORDER BY tracking_time DESC
SELECT satellite_id, location, tracking_time FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_id = 1
SELECT * FROM weather_information WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT location, weather_type FROM weather_information ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT satellite_id, location, tracking_time FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_id = 1 ORDER BY tracking_time DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_information WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_information WHERE weather_type = 'sunny' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE location LIKE 'North%'
SELECT location, tracking_time FROM satellite_tracking_data JOIN weather_information ON satellite_tracking_data.location = weather_information.location ORDER BY tracking_time
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data;
SELECT satellite_name, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_information ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_name LIKE 'Sat%';
SELECT satellite_name, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM combined_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT satellite_name, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_information WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM satellite_tracking_data JOIN combined_data ON satellite_tracking_data.id = combined_data.satellite_id WHERE temperature < 0;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM combined_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY wind_speed ASC, humidity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM weather_information ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data;
SELECT satellite_name, tracking_timestamp, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data;
SELECT satellite_id, tracking_timestamp, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data ORDER BY tracking_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_information WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT satellite_name, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE location_latitude >= 40;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, tracking_timestamp FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE location_latitude > 0;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, tracking_timestamp FROM satellite_tracking_data ORDER BY tracking_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_information WHERE temperature > 20 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, location_latitude, location_longitude, temperature, humidity FROM combined_data WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM satellite_data;
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT satellite_id, location, timestamp FROM combined_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT temperature FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'London';
SELECT * FROM tracking_data WHERE altitude > 10000;
SELECT * FROM satellite_data WHERE temperature > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, location, temperature, humidity FROM combined_data WHERE humidity > 0.8 AND temperature < 30 ORDER BY satellite_id;
SELECT * FROM tracking_data WHERE altitude BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM event_log WHERE event_type = 'error' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
